Shiner's Fencing and Contracting Ltd., a licensed Peel Fence Systems Dealer based in Newmarket, Ontario, serving all your fencing, safety and security needs since 1972.

We specialize in Wrought Iron and Chain Link systems for over 45 years. We have earned the trust of thousands of satisfied customers. From a simple chain link enclosure to keep your pet safe, to miles of Chain Link or Wrought Iron security fencing, we have done it all! Let us bring our years of experience to your projects.

Ensure your peace of mind for the safety of your family, pets and property. You can trust the professionals at PEEL FENCE for the right advice and personal service.

Visit our showroom or contact us for a free, no obligation quote.

profile:
Express Fence is a company that is focused on subdivision MULTIPLE fence projects. Our office team will work hard to get all your neighbours on board and site team will provide best workmanship to complete your fence project on time.  We build more than 15,000 ln ft of fence every year and this number is growing rapidly with hundreds of satisfied customers.

■ Unlike industry standards, we provide best estimated completion time for your project
■ We can purchase high quality material with low cost because of subdivision volume
■ Our experienced teams will complete your project with high standards and meet project deadlines
■ We provide 5 year workmanship warranty

We believe providing best customer service and products to our valued customers is our main goal as a company. Our team at the site works hard to bring best possible workmanship and our office team is focused to provide best customer service and best material with low cost possible. 

Our site teams are experienced but they always improve themselves to get better and better every day. Subdivision projects bring us volume on purchasing and we always use this buying power to reduce cost of material. This is how we can provide the best possible price with high quality fence for your home.
services: Fences, Gates, Wooden and Iron Gates, Decks and Basement Renovations...We build more than 20,000 linear feet of fences a year

profile: Mr. Fencee Inc is a Toronto based, Eco-friendly, maintenance-free fence company with over 7 years of experience. Offering clients the best quality fences at unbeatable prices with the fastest installation times in Ontario. We offer fence installations in the regions of GTA, Toronto, Mississauga, Scarborough, Markham, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Newmarket, King City, Bradford, Brampton, Oakville, Oshawa, Bradford etc. Our aim is to provide modern, and innovative fence designs at the lowest prices. Our fences are unique and manufactured domestically in North York using only recycled materials, better for the environment is better for us. There are no wooden products involved in the manufacturing or during installation of Mr. Fencee fences. More importantly, Mr. Fencee Fences are made in Canada, made for Canada, withstanding the most severe weather conditions and up to 147km/hr winds.
warranty_terms: 2 Years Labor and Lifetime Product Warranties

profile:
Ap Cons is a modern construction service provider committed to delivering the best and customizable construction services to people in Toronto. We’re a one-stop brand for property owners who desire to get the best value for their resources when hiring experts to meet their construction needs. From clearing and excavation services to home additions and all that falls in between, our team of dexterous professionals can always give you the best.

Having been in the industry for a pretty while, we’ve mastered the rudiments and all it takes to keep every customer smiling in satisfaction. Little wonder our previous clients can’t stop recommending our services and hoisting our brand name in praise. When you think of a construction company you can trust in Toronto for excellent services, Ap Cons is the brand to call.  

What We Do
Here at Ap Cons, we provide a wide range of reliable construction solutions. We strive to be involved in every project we handle from start to finish, offering our clients cost-effective solutions.
Check out our services:

Excavation
Waterproofing
Concrete Work
Home Additions
Interlocking

Ap Cons is a brand that tailors each service to meet the exact needs of each client. So, when you come to us with a project, rest assured that we’ll carve out a process that works in line with your budget, site, requirements and timeline.
project_minimum: No job is too small or big

brands: We work with the top brands throughout the industry along with all the big box stores to custom suppliers. We use only the finest products and high grade professional tools to ensure your project is built strong and withstands the test of time.
specialities: We specialize in management of full scale construction and remodeling of existing dwelling spaces. That means we can build your home from the foundation up or work with your existing space to update or enhance the space you are working with. From Additions to Custom Builds, from a driveway complete with interlocked walkway to the backyard fence which establishes your property boundaries and provides safety and security, we cover all the components in-between to make your home perfect for you and your family to enjoy for decades to come.

profile:
Have you worked with landscaping contractors before who rush through the job and leave a mess of your yard? Do you now struggle to trust someone to take care of your lawn?

We’re a team of dedicated landscaping professionals who are well-known for getting any landscaping project done right, the first time around. We’re passionate about helping homeowners and business owners reach their landscaping goals and we take pride in our ability to provide high-quality services at an affordable price.
Since opening our doors in 2018, we’ve been able to expand our service areas all thanks to our trusted customers who rely on us as their long-term landscaping partner. If you live in Rockwood, Guelph, or the KW area, give us a call or request a free quote to discuss all your landscaping needs and how we can help you accomplish them.

We offer services such as:
Design
Build
Maintenance
Snow Removal

And more!

Check us out here:

www.instagram.com/riverwood_landscape
